fields.name: break_speed_stone
fields.description: How fast the pickaxe mines per second. Caps out at 60 per second.
fields.warning: Don't go crazy with this, please. Even 20 is overkill.

fields.name: break_power_stone
fields.description: Used for both how much damage the pickaxe does to a block, and what kinds of blocks it can mine.
fields.info: The formula is damage = break_power / block_toughness - 1. If the result is negative, no damage is dealt.
